metadata.name: [RGON] TBoI: Regambled
metadata.description:
[img]https://i.ibb.co/CKj6BFwk/main-logo.png[/img]
[list] [*]Ever had [i]FUN[/i] while playing [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379780/Balatro/]Balatro[/url]? [*]Ever wanted to play [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/2379780/Balatro/]Balatro[/url] even when you're not? [/list]
[h2]LOOK NO FURTHER![/h2]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?l=spanish&id=3127536138]The latest version of [b]REPENTOGON[/b][/url] is required for the mod to function!
[img]https://i.ibb.co/b5xLwCxK/content.png[/img]
[list] [*]A whole new character with completely custom mechanics (+ its very freaky Tainted version) [list][*]both with all Balatro's original 150 jokers, vouchers, tarots and everything else for you to experiment with[/list] [*]full completion mark unlocks, varying from complete jokes all the way to fresh new items and trinkets [/list]
[img]https://i.ibb.co/fhbsgSL/customisation.png[/img]
[list] [*]Fully compatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]EID[/url] , currently translated in: [list] [*]English (Stracto) [*]Italian (Stracto) [*]Whatever language you need ([i]still looking for translators btw![/i]) [/list]
[*]Many customizable parameters available through the Dead Sea Scrolls menu [/list]
[img]https://i.ibb.co/zVcHYdc8/warning.png[/img]
[list] [*]Due to the (shitty) way the normal character was made, there may be problems with local coop [i](please report any issues so I can try my best to fix them!)[/i] [*][b]The tainted character was not built to work neither in co-op or with modded floors/enemies[/b], so expect to encounter many bugs/softlocks if that's your case! [list][*]I'd love to make it StageAPI-compatible, but since I literally couldn't understand shi from the docs given that's most likely not gonna happen ([i][u]if you know your thing with it and wanna help please let me know![/u][/i])[/list] [*][b]The use of [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=836319872]EID[/url] is highly recommended[/b] since ya know, Balatro was made with fully available descriptions in mind [*]There's currently a known conflict with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2978501842]Giga bombs synergies[/url] that causes a crash when a run is started, the exact cause is still being studied but until I find a solution I suggest to disable it while playing this mod and vice versa. [/list]
[img]https://i.ibb.co/mr7D99Xc/end.png[/img]
If you appreciate my work, then please consider donating to my [url=https://ko-fi.com/stracto]Ko-fi[/url]! Anything is more than enough to make me happy! (even nothing)
If you want to report a game crash happening then you can also send isaac's log file [url=https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfdArvAd_6DrneTHrTfqT9ZZn_WIMv7W7xK6wpz71tulD_Q8g/viewform?usp=dialog]here[/url] to help me understand better the issue!
